comments.body: Closing as the toString() method will be removed.

description:
Given:

ELException ele = new ELException();
String str = ele.toString().


Resulting stacktrace:

 java.lang.NullPointerException
     [java] 	at javax.servlet.jsp.el.ELException.toString(ELException.java:139)
summary: NPE thrown by ELException.toString() if not originally created with a root cause exception.
